title: Assembly
description: A reusable template or 'kit' of components and their quantities.

assemblyId.description: A unique identifier for this assembly template (e.g., 'ASM-VFD-1.5HP').

description.description: A human-readable name for this assembly (e.g., '1.5HP VFD Starter Kit').

category.description: A standardized category for sorting assemblies.

components.description: A list of components (from the catalog) required for this assembly.

sku.description: The 'sku' of the component, linking to the component_schema.json.

quantity.description: The number of this component required.

estimatedLaborHours.description: Estimated time in hours to build this one assembly.
